project.name: C-C089D-FFMP-10-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C089D-FFMP-10-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_7iscor7SDMT9wbjhlQBP AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_CVTsgCqDVO OR db_sql_output_oXlFmwh4yJ OR database_insert_check_5ihhbjl42Q) AND NOT timeout_legqxxeS8j) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_CVTsgCqDVO OR db_sql_output_oXlFmwh4yJ OR database_insert_check_5ihhbjl42Q) OR timeout_legqxxeS8j OR controlled_exit_FZSVHctScC)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_CVTsgCqDVO OR db_sql_output_oXlFmwh4yJ OR database_insert_check_5ihhbjl42Q) AND NOT timeout_legqxxeS8j) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_CVTsgCqDVO OR db_sql_output_oXlFmwh4yJ OR database_insert_check_5ihhbjl42Q) OR timeout_legqxxeS8j OR controlled_exit_FZSVHctScC))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
